duties_responsibilities.duty: Process guest transactions and represent outstanding customer service with a positive attitude.
Maintain a safe and clean work environment, including entryway cleanliness and cart management.
Retrieve shopping carts from the parking lot as needed.
Ensure a safe working and shopping environment while minimizing shrink and damages.
Execute company directives, policies, and procedures timely, accurately, and thoroughly.
Assist operations team with tasks as required, including front-end area cleanliness.
